title: Hotop 40 Pieces Snowboard Stomp Pad Self Adhesive Rubber Clear Ski Snowboard Stomp Pad Provides Extra Grip for Snowboarding for Men Women
features: Abundant Quantity in the Package: you will receive 40 pieces of spike stomp pads, suitable for most snowboards, sufficient to meet your daily use or replacement demands

Reliable and Serviceable: our snowboard stomps are made of quality rubber material, non slip and wear resistant, hard to break, and can provide extra traction and scrape snow from boot bottoms; It also works in cold and inclement weather, helping you stay in good shape on the slopes

Self Adhesive Design: these black stomp pad are designed with self adhesive backs, and you just need to peel off the backing and stick them on where you want, convenient for you to use; Please remove the dirt from the snowboard before installation, dry it with a towel, and paste it to the snowboard, and you can put some heavy objects on it and keep it indoors for a period of time to ensure the adhesion is firm

Personalized and Versatile Appearance: you can stick snowboard stomp pads in the right position according to your personal preference, and customize your own typesetting for your snowboard, to meet your individual needs and show your personality

Multiple Functions: these snowboard grip stomp pads can not only increase friction to provide extra traction, not easy to slip, but also suitable for most furniture, which can avoid the noise caused by abrasion and collision
